summary: My Epic Elf Archer/Thief. Sorry guys, she's a level 19 and almost done with Dawnguard, and the main quest is..broken? I'll explain. Anyway, say hello to Tiger Lily (don't ask me why I named her that..), she's a sarcastic little nub in my roleplaying thoughts that loves to pull pranks on people and just put them in bad situations. Sh
descriptionHtml:
What do you think of Tiger Lily so far? You can change her name if you want to, if it's kind of getting to ya, no problem, go right ahead! Now..onto the main problem that I would like to discuss..the mainquest.

Alright..alright..just..j-just put the chair/table/weapon down, I'm sorry, I didn't think I could get that stupid when I did it and there had been a fair warning too. Curse my silly mind! I installed a beautiful mod called Behemoth the Feathered Dragon by Zero Satyr, replaces Odahviing textures and slightly alters the behavior to make him more aggressive. Texture and dragon made completely out of scratch...wonderfully done (like all his other mods!). Well..I caught him in Dragonsreach and take in mind..he's a lot more aggressive now due to the mod which the author warned everyone about in the description and now due to my thoughtlessness I am paying for it, ahaha! As soon as I release him..he starts attacking me as well as everyone else in Dragonsreach... if anyone can fix that..great!! But I'm sure it is baked into my save, maybe if you don't install the mod at all..it'll be fine..but I have a feeling Odah will still be aggressive. Sorry again...if you guys don't really mind not finishing the quest...awesome!

Dawnguard is almost finished, Haven't touched Companions, Dark Brotherhood, or Dragonborn (I've been attacked by cultists though). College of Winterhold has been started due to main quest but I haven't talked to Mirabelle yet. I have a mod that introduces a new quest made from scratch, it's called Undeath and you start it at level 30. Beautifully done! Check it out if you want. Thieves Guild is completely finished. If there is anything else I left..I'm sorry. Dawnguard, Dragonborn, Hearthfire, and the latest skyrim update is on my save file so I suggest you get those if you truly want to experience what I am.

Here is a list of mods that I use. I use a macbook pro for my Skyrim. Works beautifully, no lag.
Skyrim.esm
Dawnguard.esm
Dragonborn.esm
HearthFires.esm
ApachiiHair.esm
RaceCompatibility.esm
SkyMoMod.esm
Dawnguard.bsa
Dragonborn.bsa
HearthFires.bsa
SkyMoMod.bsa
Dread Knight Weapon Set.esp
daedric_phelm.esp
armored-horses.esp
The Dance of Death.esp
theRoadstrokersRogueSorceress.esp
ESPv1_1nondependent.esp
Gizmodian-Witchbane.esp
LovelyHairstylesCE.esp
Almalexia Regalia.esp
Almalexia Regalia.bsa
Unlimited Rings Multilingual.esp
Unlimited Rings Multilingual.bsa
Blaze Of Eventide.esp
Blaze Of Eventide.bsa
Faallokaar.esp
MiraakFollower.esp
MiraakFollower.bsa
GreenWaterFix_v2withDawnguard.esp
NS_Eilhart_Dress.esp
TemptressVixen.esp
Alternate Start - Live Another Life.esp
Alternate Start - Live Another Life.bsa
SGEyebrows.esp
The Paarthurnax Dilemma.esp
The Paarthurnax Dilemma.bsa
Undeath.esp
Undeath.bsa
Behemoth Dragon.esp
BellyachesNewDragonSpecies.esp
Raven Witch Armor.esp
EpicElves by zzjay.esp
DreamBurrowsSageOutfit.esp
Map Markers.esp
dD - Enhanced Blood Main.esp
dD - Enhanced Blood Main.bsa
BlackSacramentArmor.esp
BlackSacramentArmor.bsa

Yes..I know..at lot of mods..but it's fun modding the game up! I enjoy it, I choose more of the lore friendly ones though. Anyway!! Tell me what you think! You can critisize, I'll probably be crying with my pillow pet but no worries! Upload pics of Tiger Lily or [insert name here]! Change her up, change her hair, whatever you want! I want to see what you think! Thank you for even taking the time to check this out...this is the very first file I've ever loaded..I don't create mods..but I wish I had the capability to do so. It is such an amazing skill to have. Thank you out there you authors, you make my life! ^^
author: SugarandSpice123
